entities.name: pensieve
entities.description: The pensieve is described as a container with a substance inside it, where Harry's thoughts are stored.

entities.name: basin
entities.description: The basin is the location where the pensieve is situated, and where Harry finds himself after falling through it.

entities.name: stone bottom
entities.description: The stone bottom of the basin is mentioned as a potential impact point for Harry's head.

entities.name: whirlpool
entities.description: The dark whirlpool is described as a sensation that Harry experiences when falling through the pensieve.

entities.name: bench
entities.description: Harry finds himself sitting on a bench at the end of the room inside the basin.

entities.name: ceiling
entities.description: The high stone ceiling is mentioned as something that Harry looks up at in the room inside the basin.

entities.name: window
entities.description: The circular window through which Harry had been staring before falling into the pensieve is mentioned.

entities.name: stone
entities.description: The stone material is mentioned as making up the ceiling and bottom of the basin.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who falls through the pensieve and finds himself in a room inside it.

entities.name: witches
entities.description: There are at least two hundred witches present in the room where Harry finds himself.

entities.name: wizards
entities.description: There are also wizards present in the room where Harry finds himself.

relationships.description: Harry falls through the pensieve and finds himself inside it.
After falling through the pensieve, Harry finds himself inside the basin.
